code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const menuItems=[{name:'Home',path:'/'},{name:'ACE Dashboard',path:'/ace'},{name:'WAS Dashboard',path:'/was'},{name:'Health Checks',path:'/health-checks'},{name:'E-Cat | HSBC',path:'/ecat'},{name:'Database',path:'/database'},{name:'Command Executor',path:'/command-executor'},{name:'HUB01',path:'/hub01'},{name:'HUB03',path:'/hub03'},{name:'ACE Frontends',path:'/ace-frontends'},{name:'Reports',path:'/reports'}];const Sidebar=()=>{const location=useLocation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("aside",{className:"w-64 h-screen fixed left-0 top-[88px]",style:{backgroundColor:'#030304'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-bold mb-6",style:{color:'#8DE971'},children:"Control Center"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"space-y-2",children:menuItems.map(item=>{const isActive=location.pathname===item.path;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:item.path,className:"block w-full text-left px-4 py-3 rounded-lg transition-all ".concat(isActive?'font-semibold':''),style:isActive?{backgroundColor:'#F6F2F4',color:'#030304'}:{color:'#F6F2F4',backgroundColor:'transparent'},onMouseEnter:e=>{if(!isActive){e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor='rgba(141, 233, 113, 0.1)';}},onMouseLeave:e=>{if(!isActive){e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor='transparent';}},children:item.name},item.path);})})]})});};export default Sidebar;
